item.title: Announcing Neki
item.description: ð Exciting news in the database world! Today, the team behind Vitess announced Neki, a new sharded Postgres solution. Neki aims to bring the power of explicit sharding to Postgres users, leveraging insights from extensive experience with Vitess. This initiative is not a fork of Vitess but a fresh architecture designed to handle demanding workloads effectively. Stay updated on Neki’s development by signing up at neki.dev! #Neki #Postgres #Databases #OpenSource #Vitess
